app.name: Crispy Doom
app.short_description: Play Doom on the Wii U
app.long_description:
Crispy Doom is a limit-removing enhanced-resolution Doom source port based on Chocolate Doom. It was ported to the Wii U by thearst3rd. For more information, visit:
https://www.chocolate-doom.org/wiki/index.php/Crispy_Doom https://github.com/thearst3rd/crispy-doom/tree/wiiu-port
Put your limit-removing WADs in sd:/wiiu/apps/crispy-doom/wads
Thanks for playing!
